question: You live in a block of flats, your neighbour makes a lot of noise which has caused problems for you. Write a letter to your landlord.In your letter, you should:•	explain the situation•	tell him/her how you are affected by this•	Suggest what you want the landlord to do.
text: I am writing to explain about the problems that I have with my next door neighbour and inquire assistance from you .

I have been living in block 2 on the second floor for about 2 years , we used to create quite calm space with my neighbour but last month the Jame family moved to my next door that is very noisy. For example ,they usually play music at midnight and sometimes watch movies loudly, in fact, I have complained many times and asked them to avoid making noise but they keep doing the same.
As you know I have 2 children that they go to school early and when Mr jame make noise , they can not sleep properly. Obviously, I have a lot of complaints from their teachers.
In fact , I would like to ask you to explain the situation to Mr Jame and notice them aware of our laws about having a comfortable place to live .
I look forward to receiving your prompt attention regarding  this matter.
